SELECT A.* ,IFNULL((SELECT MAX(ASSET_NAME) FROM RFID_INSP_ITEM WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO), A.PRODNM) AS ASSET_NAME ,IFNULL((SELECT MAX(ASSET_YN) FROM RFID_INSP_ITEM WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO), 'Y') AS ASSET_YN ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO) AS VIRT_ASSET_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO AND TAG_PRINT_CNT > 0) AS TAG_PRINT_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO AND ASSET_STATUS_CD <> '가자산') AS INSP_ASSET_CNT ,(SELECT MAX(INSP_DT) FROM RFID_INSP_ASSET WHERE PURNO = A.PURNO AND RQSTNO = A.RQSTNO AND PRODNO = A.PRODNO) INSP_DT FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY PURNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.* , A1.CONTRNO CONT_NO , A1.PURNM CONT_NAME , B.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , B.POS_NO , B.POS_NAME , C.DEPT_NO , C.DEPT_NAME , D.DEPT_NO TOP_DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME TOP_DEPT_NAME , E.USER_NO CONT_REQ_USER_NO , E.USER_NAME CONT_REQ_USER_NAME FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A INNER JOIN RFID_CONTRACT A1 ON A.PURNO = A1.PURNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_USER B ON A.USERHISNO = B.USER_HIS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_DEPT C ON B.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_DEPT D ON C.PARENT_DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_USER E ON A1.USERHISNO = E.USER_HIS_NO WHERE A.PURNO = #{purno} AND A.RQSTNO = #{rqstno} AND A.PRODNO = #{prodno}
